item.title: Johnny Trigger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Johnny Trigger is not only a third-person shooting but also a skillful arcade game with 3D stickman game art animation. You are acting a killer who is good at eliminate a guy with one shot. There are many enemies stand on your road, you needs to kill all of them in a proper time. Never […]
item.content:encoded:
Johnny Trigger is not only a third-person shooting but also a skillful arcade game with 3D stickman game art animation. You are acting a killer who is good at eliminate a guy with one shot. There are many enemies stand on your road, you needs to kill all of them in a proper time. Never make a mistake of being killed in Johnny Trigger!
Mouse click or tap the screen to play

item.title: Road Trip
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Road Trip plays like a car side-scrolling stunt arcade game that is made of two-dimensional game art animation. It is managed for you to collect gold coins and keep balanced on all the terrains while driving the car. It is obvious that the point is to control the speed in Road Trip!Tap
item.content:encoded:
Road Trip plays like a car side-scrolling stunt arcade game that is made of two-dimensional game art animation. It is managed for you to collect gold coins and keep balanced on all the terrains while driving the car. It is obvious that the point is to control the speed in Road Trip!
Tap

item.title: Truck Loader Online Master
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Truck Loader Online Master is a cartoon-style 2D game. Players need to drive the truck to move back and forth, transport the goods to the designated location, and then deliver the container to the truck. It is worth noting that some levels have only one container, and most There are many containers in the level […]
item.content:encoded:
Truck Loader Online Master is a cartoon-style 2D game. Players need to drive the truck to move back and forth, transport the goods to the designated location, and then deliver the container to the truck. It is worth noting that some levels have only one container, and most There are many containers in the level of, so players need to make good use of the magnet function to attach the goods to the iron products, and finally place the containers on the truck. This game requires great patience, wish you success!
use arrow keys and click the mouse to play.

item.title: Neon Shot
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Have you played the game Angry Birds? Neon Shot is this neon pixel style game. This is a fun physics catapult game. The game uses a very classic pixel style. Your task is to launch a ball to crash all targets. And try to collect all the coins. The ball follows the principles of physics, […]
item.content:encoded:
Have you played the game Angry Birds? Neon Shot is this neon pixel style game. This is a fun physics catapult game. The game uses a very classic pixel style. Your task is to launch a ball to crash all targets. And try to collect all the coins. The ball follows the principles of physics, and its trajectory will change according to the law of reflection. Have you thought about how to launch it? If you like this game, don’t forget to share it with your friends!
Click and drag the mouse to play.

item.title: Stair Run
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Smoothly surpassing red areas with many items, so that you can always maintain a safe state, the gameplay is still quite casual, very suitable to pass the time when you are bored. Your task is to reach the end, but there will be various obstacles blocking you on the road. You have to pass the […]
item.content:encoded:
Smoothly surpassing red areas with many items, so that you can always maintain a safe state, the gameplay is still quite casual, very suitable to pass the time when you are bored. Your task is to reach the end, but there will be various obstacles blocking you on the road. You have to pass the obstacles by jumping or stacking bricks. Bricks are very useful so you have to collect more on the road to building stairs more. Enjoy the new hot game Stair Run.
Tap to play.
